IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_azdatapreconstoredev_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_azdatapreconstoredev_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@azdatapreconstoredev.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'Inspection')
	CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Inspection (
		[HSISID] bigint,
		[Score] int,
		[Description] nvarchar(max),
		[Type] nvarchar(150),
		[Inspector] nvarchar(150),
		[InspectionDate] date,
		[PermitID] int,
		[RestaurantName] nvarchar(4000),
		[InspectionKey] nvarchar(100)
		)
		WITH (
		LOCATION = 'wakeinspections/refined/inspections/**',
		DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_azdatapreconstoredev_dfs_core_windows_net],
		FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
		)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Inspection
GO

-- Note that this does NOT allow for partition elimination!
-- In order to use partition elimination (generally something you want),
-- create a view with OPENROWSET() instead:

CREATE VIEW vInspection AS
SELECT
	t.*,
	t.filepath(1) AS [Year],
	t.filepath(2) AS [Month]
FROM OPENROWSET(
	BULK 'wakeinspections/refined/inspections/Year=*/Month=*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = 'synapse_azdatapreconstoredev_dfs_core_windows_net',
	FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS t;
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM dbo.vInspection;
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM dbo.vInspection i
WHERE
	i.Year = 2016
	AND i.Month = 6;
GO
